description: The man and woman sitting on the couch, looking at a TV screen.
text:
Man: Let's watch a movie.
Woman: Okay.

description: The man and woman sitting on the couch, asleep.
The man and woman sitting on the couch, awake and looking at each other.
text:
Man: That was a good movie.
Woman: Yeah.

description: The man and woman standing in front of a mirror, getting ready to go out.
text:
Man: You look beautiful.
Woman: Thanks.

description: The man and woman walking down the street, holding hands.
text:
Man: I'm glad we decided to go out.
Woman: Me too.
